attributes.action: If Bremain win a 2nd referendum, it's only fair that it's a best out of 3.
attributes.additional_details: All background information can be found on national and local media, including digital media.
attributes.background:
It doesn't really need much explaining this one. 
 Basically if Bremain get a second referendum and win, that makes the result a draw,  with the score being one a piece. 
Isn't it only fair that it's a best out of three? 
(Unless it's a Bremain win, then it's best out of five)
